title: Rush 1977 - A Farewell To Kings (2009 Japan) FLAC
description:
COVER ART: included (hight quality, front, back, cd, entire booklet)


A Farewell to Kings is the fifth studio album by Canadian rock band Rush, released in 1977. It was recorded at Rockfield Studios in Wales, and mixed at Advision Studios in London. A Farewell to Kings would become Rush's first US gold-selling album, receiving the certification within two months of its release, and was eventually certified platinum.
